Subject: Netwrix Support Ticket #411120 - ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000BULog:ref - Customer is requesting update

TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000BULog:ref

Unfortunately the Audit Log Backup did not clear up any space.


This is the current message: Your appliance is running low on disk space, there is 9.97 gb free available from 49.09 gb (20%). EPP Server functionality and performance may be severely affected. Use Audit Log Backup to reduce the logs stored in the database, delete older system and audit log backups, and tune policies to reduce incoming log count. For further assistance contact Support.
Subject: Netwrix Support Ticket #411120 - Appliance disk space warning.
